content.query:
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [dbo].[TripData]
	AS 
	SELECT 'Y' AS Source, vendorID AS Vendor, tpepPickupDateTime AS Pickup, tpepDropoffDateTime AS DropOff, 
            DATEDIFF(minute, tpepPickupDateTime, tpepDropoffDateTime) / 60.0 AS TripTime, tripDistance AS Distance, puLocationId AS PickUpZone, doLocationId AS DropOffZone FROM
		OPENROWSET(
			BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
			FORMAT='PARQUET'
		) AS [nycy]
	UNION
	SELECT 'G' AS Source, vendorID AS Vendor, lpepPickupDateTime AS Pickup, lpepDropoffDateTime AS DropOff, 
            DATEDIFF(minute, lpepPickupDateTime, lpepDropoffDateTime) / 60.0 AS TripTime, tripDistance AS Distance, puLocationId AS PickUpZone, doLocationId AS DropOffZone FROM
		OPENROWSET(
			BULK 'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/green/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
			FORMAT='PARQUET'
		) AS [nycg]
